## About

I'm an engineer and entrepreneur leveraging AI to solve meaningful problems in **healthcare**, **education**, and **crisis management**. With dual Master's degrees from **UC Berkeley** (Biomedical Engineering) and **CentraleSup√©lec** (Machine Learning), I bridge the gap between cutting-edge research and real-world impact.

Currently serving as **VP of Product & Engineering** at [Parallel Learning](https://parallellearning.com), where we're transforming how schools support students with learning differences.

## Ventures

| Company                                                     | Role                        | Focus                                                                       |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Parallel Learning](https://parallellearning.com)**       | VP of Product & Engineering | Teletherapy platform empowering K-12 students with learning differences     |
| **[Polygon](https://merylldindin.com/ventures/polygon/)**   | Co-Founder & CTO            | Remote diagnostics for ADHD, dyslexia & learning differences ‚Äî raised $4.2M |
| **[CalAster](https://merylldindin.com/ventures/calaster/)** | Co-Founder & CEO            | AI-powered mental health solutions for first responders                     |

## Research & Publications

- **[Topological Data Analysis for Arrhythmia Detection](https://arxiv.org/abs/1906.05795)** ‚Äî Novel deep learning approach using TDA for ECG classification (Springer, ICANN 2020)
- **[NIST Computer Vision Challenge](https://cdn.merylldindin.com/documents/nist-challenge.pdf)** ‚Äî Phase 2 winner & "Best Assessment Data" award at [NIST PSCR 2020](https://www.nist.gov/ctl/pscr/open-innovation-prize-challenges/past-prize-challenges/2020-enhancing-computer-vision)
- **[Sleep Stage Classification with ML](https://medium.com/data-science/my-sweet-dreams-about-automatic-sleep-stage-classification-414128441728)** ‚Äî EEG signal processing and automated sleep analysis
- **[ToMATo Clustering](https://medium.com/data-science/tda-to-rule-them-all-tomato-clustering-878e03394a1)** ‚Äî Topological data analysis for robust clustering

## Patents

- **[US12346791B2](https://patents.google.com/patent/US12346791B2)** ‚Äî Abnormality determination using persistent homology & autoencoders for ECG analysis
- **[EP4075330A1](https://patents.google.com/patent/EP4075330A1)** ‚Äî Real-time manufacturing monitoring via CNN-based video analysis
- **[LU102785B1](https://patents.google.com/patent/LU102785B1)** ‚Äî ML-driven simulation process for manufacturing systems
